item.title: How I Built a Blog Without WordPress XML
item.description: A quick summary of how I created a blog without using WordPress XML export.
item.content:encoded:
In this post, I explain how I migrated my blog without using a WordPress XML export. Instead, I used GitHub and Markdown to create a lightweight static blog.

What I Used

  • GitHub Pages for hosting
  • Markdown files for content
  • Jekyll to generate the static site

This approach gave me full control, no database overhead, and a cleaner writing workflow.
